title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated release dates for enterprise-server versions 3.14, 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17 from August 19 to August 25, 2025.
Added `base64Supported` field to all entries in secret scanning data (mostly `false`, `true` for GitHub tokens except SSH).
Removed Akamai API credentials from supported secrets.
Updated SHA hashes in secret scanning configuration file.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated release dates for enterprise-server versions 3.14, 3.15, 3.16, and 3.17 from August 19 to August 25, 2025.
- Added `base64Supported` field to all entries in secret scanning data (mostly `false`, `true` for GitHub tokens except SSH).
- Removed Akamai API credentials from supported secrets.
- Updated SHA hashes in secret scanning configuration file.

### Title
Update enterprise release dates and sync secret scanning data
